howItWorks.label: How It Works
howItWorks.title: Get started in three simple steps
howItWorks.subtitle: From sign-up to live chat in minutes. No complex setup, no coding expertise required.

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up and complete our guided onboarding. Configure your AI agent's personality, knowledge base, and response preferences in just a few clicks.

step2.title: Embed the Script
step2.description: Copy and paste a single line of code into your website. Our lightweight script loads asynchronously and won't affect your page performance.

step3.title: Customize & Launch
step3.description: Fine-tune your chat widget's appearance to match your brand. Train your AI agent with your FAQs and documentation, then go live instantly.
